import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Card, Upload,Spin } from 'antd'; import {withRouter} from 'react-router' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Button } from 'antd' import { message } from 'antd' import { Divider } from 'antd'; import { Image } from 'antd'; export class ProfilePage extends Component { render() { return(
  1. Profile

    ); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ auth: state.auth.user, is_loading: state.auth.isLoading }); export default connect(mapStateToProps,)(withRouter(ProfilePage));
